name: Aliens on the Table
summary: Aliens on the Table is an augmented reality game,where the player shoot the aliens from the air trying to stop the invasion. Its the final Battle of the war where aliens try to send a message for their home asking for a backup through a portal which they try to build. The primary objective of the game is to stop the Aliens from sending a portal message and ultimately winning the war and you also have soldiers to fight on your side, you have the your own team to back you up and win the war against aliens.
